data.title: Britannia Industries Limited
data.meta_description: Britannia Industries Limited - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Britannia Industries Limited (BIL) is the largest food company in India, generating Rs. 46.70 billion in annual revenue primarily from biscuit sales. Set up in 1892 with an initial investment of Rs. 295, BIL has grown to become a major player in the Indian foods market with a 38% market share. BIL's vision is to dominate the Indian food and beverage market with a range of "Tasty Yet Healthy" brands and to make every third Indian a Britannia consumer. Its product portfolio includes popular biscuit brands like Tiger, Good Day, and Bourbon. BIL relies on a network of distributors like Hindustan Agencies in Bhubaneswar to transport products
